eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: The governor sets token whitelist for an ERC1155 token.

functionDecorators.name: claimOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Needs to be called by `pendingOwner` to claim ownership.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership to `newOwner`. Either directly or claimable by the new pending owner. Can only be invoked by the current `owner`.

parameterDecorators.name: direct
parameterDecorators.description: True if `newOwner` should be set immediately. False if `newOwner` needs to use `claimOwnership`.

parameterDecorators.name: renounce
parameterDecorators.description: Allows the `newOwner` to be `address(0)` if `direct` and `renounce` is True. Has no effect otherwise.
